duties_responsibilities.duty: Manufacture commercial scale batches of pharmaceutical formulations.
Assist in facility cleaning, maintenance, and process validations.
Perform aseptic production operations and qualifications, including environmental monitoring and aseptic certifications.
Assist in clean room sanitization and RCRA and safety inspections.
Document work as per CGMPs and follow Company SOPs and guidelines.
Abide by safety requirements and respond to assignments in a changing job environment.

education_certification.credential: Preferred: 0-1 year experience in a sterile pharmaceutical operation for Manufacturing Associate I.
Preferred: 1-3 years of manufacturing or equivalent experience for Manufacturing Associate II.
Required: 4-5 years’ experience in pharmaceutical Manufacturing for Manufacturing Associate III.
Preferred: 2-3 years’ experience in a sterile pharmaceutical operation for Manufacturing Associate III.
